content.title: E-Medhabruti
content.details: The scheme 'e-Medhabruti' is a Scholarship Scheme by the Higher Education Department, Government of Odisha. The objective of the scheme is to provide financial assistance of up to ₹ 20,000 to meritorious students of Odisha whose parental income does not exceed ₹ 6,00,000. The number of scholarships that are awarded every year is 14,500. The scholarship is provided for the complete duration of the course. The student can apply for e-Medhabruti Scholarship only in the year of joining (i.e. 1st year of the course).
benefits: U.G. Merit: 6,000 scholarships at ₹ 5,000 per year
P.G. Merit: 2,500 scholarships at ₹ 10,000 per year
Technical & Professional Merit: 6,000 scholarships at ₹ 10,000 per year
eligibility: Parental income not exceeding ₹ 6,00,000 per annum
Minimum of 60% marks in the previous qualifying examination
Application only in the year of joining (1st year of the course)
exclusions: Students pursuing higher study through open universities or distance learning
Students already availing scholarships under any other schemes
Students of M.Phil., Ph.D., B.Ed., and M.Ed.
Students completing one Technical/Professional course and pursuing another
Students not validated by the concerned Principal/Institution
documents_required: Mark Sheets of the Last Qualifying Examination
Bank Account details of the student
College ID Card or Admission receipt

faqs.question: Which Department Manages The 'E-Medhabruti' Scholarship Scheme?
faqs.answer: The 'e-Medhabruti' Scholarship Scheme is managed by the Higher Education Department, Government of Odisha.

faqs.question: What Is The Maximum Amount Of Financial Assistance Available Through This Scheme?
faqs.answer: The maximum amount of financial assistance available through this scheme is ₹ 20,000.

faqs.question: How Many Scholarships Shall Be Awarded In 2023?
faqs.answer: The number of scholarships that are awarded every year is 14,500.

faqs.question: What Shall Be The Duration Of The Scholarship?
faqs.answer: The scholarship is provided for the complete duration of the course.

faqs.question: Can I Apply For The Scholarship If I Am Studying In The 2nd Year Of The Degree Course?
faqs.answer: No, the student can apply for e-Medhabruti Scholarship only in the year of joining (1st year of the course).
